description:
1st ever OPO.design meetup. This event is FREE but you should register for it! 
The guests are Luís Vaz (https://twitter.com/luismvaz), Founder of Canvaz Design Studio, and Marco Oliveira (https://twitter.com/sonicspot), CEO at MOXY, who’ll be delivering two design talks, and a lot of better use cases for Comic Sans.
name: OPO.design #1 - Porto Design Community Meetup
